Why Conservatism is not the Answer

If we look at the timeline of Conservatism throughout Europe and in the U.S. we will see that it is a stagnant and intermediary political ideology. No major changes for the betterment of a nation have occurred under Conservatism nor has it successfully defended itself against Marxism once.

Pre-WW2 Conservatism in Europe has been totally forgotten in history because it offered nothing for the world. With the rising tide of Marxism across Europe, back then, Conservatism was negligent and non-combative towards Marxism. This is why fascism was used as the only viable solution to combat Marxism(among other reasons).

Post-WW2 American Conservatism was slowly but successfully subverted by the Marxists(Progressives/Liberals). The Conservatives back then never pointed this out or even countered the Liberals when they took over Hollywood, the media, or academia. Conservatives were, and still are, totally blindsided by the 1965 Immigration Act that has been reshaping America demographically and politically in favor of the Democrats. To accelerate the destruction of the Conservative party,
the 1986 Immigration Reform and Control Act President Reagan signed granted amnesty to 3 million illegals(primarily Hispanics in California). Shortly after, California went from a Conservative stronghold, to a Democrat stronghold.

To go even further within American Conservatism, it has done a pathetic job to protect the constitution, American national security and the economy. We can point out the trillions the Democratic Party has wasted on the War on Poverty yet the Conservatives(Neo-Cons included) have done their fair share of racking up massive debt with pointless wars.

Now, we watch the conservatives today finally pointing out that the Left has taken over Hollywood, the media, academia and now major corporations. But what is their answer to the Left wing upper hand? Complain.

Conservatives are still doing victory laps from the 2016 election. Meanwhile, the Left is de-platforming and almost all Conservative voices. Antifa and other radical left wing organizations are pumping fear into conservatives to a point where they are becoming fearful of gathering publicly. The conservatives squirm when they are accused of racism or sexual assault rather than pointing out the Left’s reiterated and deceitful tactics. We still have no wall, the 18 million illegals have not been deported, and what’s all we’ve gotten so far is a tax break.

Conservatism lacks the energy, spirit and tact to overthrow the Marxist onslaught. A radical political ideology is thus needed in these dark times. Fascism is the only political ideology that has defeated Marxism and contains the necessary solutions to destroy the Neo-Marxist dystopia we are forced to live in today.
